data.title: Studios La Buissonne
data.text:
Our Studio offers itself to all the musics for the 37 past years and we had pleasure to offer our skills and our experience in the service of the music of numerous artists.

Among them : Tigran Hamasyan, Nasheet Waits, Brian Blade, Brad Meldhau, Joey Baron, Larry Grenadier, Nick Mason (Pink Floyd), Pino Paladino, Lucky Peterson,Quatuor BÃ©la, Emile Parisien, Vincent Courtois, Andy Emler, Avishai Cohen, Stephan Oliva, Louis Sclavis, Manu KatchÃ©, Daniel Mille, Charles Aznavour, Daniel Humair, Martial Solal, Jean-Louis Trintignant, Gary Peacock, Bill Stewart, Bill Carrothers, Paul Motian, Julien Lourau, Richard Galliano, Dave Douglas, John Surman, Dave Liebman, Marine Bercot, Charlie Haden, Paul Bley, Steve Swallow, Carla Bley, Louis Bertignac, Philippe Katerine, Mina Agossi, Ahmad Jamal, Mulatu AstatkÃ©, Jo Lovano, Claude Tchamitchian, Ravi Coltrane, Dominique A, Gipsy King, Mireille Mathieu, Dominique Miller, Elina Duni, Fred Thomas, Jean Marie Machado, Billy Hart, Ambrose Akinmusire, Mark Turner, Raoul Petite...

We have already recorded over 1,500 albums in our Studios. However, we have not found the time yet to put on-line the entire references of the studios. An alphabet primer of the artists and the labels can guide you in the archives of this wonderful adventure that is "La Buissonne".

You will SEE HERE some artists photos who came recording in our studios.

You will find below a non exhaustive list of SOME RECENT RECORDINGS.
